metadata.title: Sample Hadith Collection
metadata.author: Quranly Team
metadata.introduction: This is a sample collection used when the API is unavailable.

hadiths.arabic: إنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ، وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى

english.text: The reward of deeds depends upon the intentions and every person will get the reward according to what he has intended.

hadiths.arabic: طلب العلم فريضة على كل مسلم

english.text: Seeking knowledge is an obligation upon every Muslim.

hadiths.arabic: من سلك طريقا يلتمس فيه علما سهل الله له طريقا إلى الجنة

english.text: Whoever takes a path in search of knowledge, Allah makes the path to Paradise easy for him.

hadiths.arabic: الإيمان بضع وسبعون شعبة والحياء شعبة من الإيمان

english.text: Faith has seventy-odd branches, and modesty is a branch of faith.

hadiths.arabic: لا يؤمن أحدكم حتى يحب لأخيه ما يحب لنفسه

english.text: None of you [truly] believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
